MinimalWCMinimize.MinimizeButtonHint: Add a minimize button on all floating windows.
MinimalWCMinimize.OrganizedMinimizeHint: Organize minimized windows by placing them either on a bottom line or top bar.
MinimalWCMinimize.PinnedButtonHint: Add a pin button on windows. If clicked, such windows may not be closed, only minimized.
MinimalWCMinimize.MaximizeButtonHint: Add a maximize button on resizeable windows. May not work well with all systems
